Now some questions about people from other countries coming to live in country.

Allow many to come and live here

People differ in their ideas about the ages at which girls or women become adults, middle-aged and old.

And at what age, approximately, would you say women reach middle age?
And at what age, approximately, would you say women reach old age?

To be considered an adult how important is it for a woman to have left the parental home?
Choose your answer from this card.

We are now going to ask you a series of questions about the ideal age for girls or women to do certain things, then about when they are too young and finally about when they are too old to do certain things.
In each case please give an approximate age.

In your opinion, what is the ideal age for a girl or woman to become a mother?
In your opinion, what is the ideal age for a woman to retire permanently?
